text: Yedina allaha saba'ike ekatrita karabena, he jina sampradaya, tomara manusadera madhye anekake anugami kare niyecha. Tadera manaba bandhura balabeh he amadera palanakarta, amara paraspare parasparera madhyame phala labha karechi. Apani amadera jan'ye ye samaya nirdharana karechilena, amara tate upanita hayechi. Allaha balabenah aguna hala tomadera basasthana. Tathaya tomara cirakala abasthana karabe; kintu yakhana ca'ibena allaha. Niscaya apanara palanakarta prajnamaya, mahajnani.
